column1: Smoque BBQ////Definitely as good as it gets.  Smoque BBQ is as good as good if not better than anything you'll get in St Louis
column2: Memphis or Kansas City.  If there's a line outside rest assured it's because the food is good.  Don't fret over the line or the wait
column3: if any.  Just enjoy and quit bitchin about any inconvenience to you. The food is worth waiting for.
